com.ctk150230

Class TestingSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctk150230.DataSet
      • com.ctk150230.TestingSet

  • class TestingSet
extends DataSet

    TestingSet

    A subclass of the DataSet class used to test the calculated probabilities from the BayesianProb class and output the results to the console. testData contains LinkedHashMaps holding the attribute values for each data instance. An entry in the List corresponds to a data instance and each contained LinkedHashMap holds that instance's values on each attribute.
    Since:
    2017-09-26
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Charles Krol
    See Also:
    DataSet, BayesianProb, ArrayList, LinkedHashMap, IOException

    • Method Detail

      • buildTestData

        private void buildTestData()
        Creates testing data from the super class data structures Each ArrayList entry represents a data instance with a LinkedHashMap entry holding it's attribute values

      • testData

        void testData(BayesianProb trainingData,
              java.lang.String testType)
        Iterates through each data instance and calculates the probabilities of whether the data is more likely to be positive or negative, compares with the actual classification of the instance, counts the number of correctly predicted classifications, it's percentage of all the data, and output the results to the console
        Parameters:
        trainingData - contains conditional probabilities calculated from training data
        testType - A String used to format the correct output to identify what type of data we are using to test the learned data

      • testPositive

        Calculates the probability of the instance with specified attributes being classified positively
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the probability of this class being classified positively
